RelationshipElement.name: Site - Site Record
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Site Site Name
property.formatString: SITE-$2

property.name: Latitude
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Longitude
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Northing
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Easting
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Accuracy
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Comments
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Site Record ID
property.formatString: REC-$2-

property.name: Data recorded by
property.description: Name of the person recording the data.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Last Rainfall
property.description: 1 = Within 24 hours, 2 = 1-3 days, 3 = 4-7 days, 4 = > 7 days, Blank = Unknown
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Rainfall Description
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Flow magnitude
property.description: 1 = No flow, 2 = Low Flow, 3 = Medium Flow, 4 = High Flow, 5 = Over Bank Flow
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Observation
property.description: Please note down any visible pollution, wildlife present, odour etc.
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Available Phosphate mg L
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Comments
property.description: "Report unusual results or changes to your sampling site to your regional coordinator on: 02 9320 6422. Pollution incident reporting information is available on the website."
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}
